pageContext.claim: “We have an asylum situation that is so ridiculous. We're the only country in the world with the things that we have to do.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is routinely astonished by the workings of U.S. and international laws on asylum. This is how it works in any country that abides by the Universal Declaration of Human Rights and the United Nations Protocol Relating to the Status of Refugees: A refugee enters and makes a petition, and the government makes a ruling after analyzing the facts. It's also worth keeping in mind that {85 percent} of all deportations in the United States are ordered quickly, without a hearing before a judge.
